description:
Cook for a crowd, with ingredients and utensils at hand and plenty of food prep space. A heat-resistant counter puts the stove at perfect working height, while hooks on the side tables let you hang spatulas, garbage bags and cups. The whole thing sets up and folds down easy as a beach chair.

  • Frame is made of powder-coated steel
  • 4 fold-out, plastic side tables have beverage holders, stem glass holders, and hooks
  • Lower rack fits a small cooler
  • Includes a carry handle for easy transport
  • Table and shelves support a combined weight of 136kg
  • Unfolded dimensions are 132 x 81 x 53cm
  • Folded dimensions are 89 x 53 x 9cm
name: GCI Outdoor Slim-Fold Cook Station
